Avin Vadas

Designer&
Illustrator

I design working tools for IT & Dev. Let's meet

My process:

  1. Research & mapping

    Analyze your current user journey and define the problems we will be solving.

  2. Solution narrow down

    Specifying the optimal solution for your goals & budget.

  3. Low fidellity design

    Designing your future user flow and specify our general components.

  4. High fidelity design

    Visual UI & interactoin design.

  5. Guidelines & documentation

    Documenting design guidelines and reusable components for your product's scaling and team's future work.

Sample Projects:

  • HCL Software

    AppScan products family

    AppScan is a leading platform for applications security testing. Their overall environment helps organizations discover vulnerabilities in their code and manage their risk.

    Contribution:

    Cross-platform unified Design System for AppScan products family, including setting up, maintaining and training for inhouse design team.

    • Visit AppScan on Cloud
  • Zerto Ltd.

    Zerto Mobile App

    Zerto provides disaster recovery and business continuity software for enterprise class companies. their mobile app help Managers to monitor the organisation's disaster recovery system and reoprt the status of it's business continuity.

    Contribution:

    Product Design of the application, creating first adaption of desktop UI environment into a mobile one.

    • View on AppStore
    • View on Google Play
  • Taboola

    Hack The Vault

    Taboola is a world-leading content discovery platform, always on the look for the best developers in the market. In this Guerilla recruitment campaign, I was working with both HR and in-house developers to create a viral riddle, based on a code-editor-like environment.

    Contribution:

    Creative, Design & Art-Direction.

    • Visit website

About me:

a Creative Director, Product Designer and Illustrator with 20 years of experience, based in Lisbon.
I specialize in the design of digital working tools, making people's tasks easier, their day more efficient and their experience more rewarding.
I have been fortunate to work, among other clients, with IBM, HCL Software, Taboola, Zerto, SundaySky, and more.
